timeline.author: gjwatts

replies.bodyText: ds1 is a java.sql.DataSource type.  Not all database drivers support a loginTimeout property when using that type of DataSource.  Therefore, I switched to use ds2 which is a javax.sql.XADataSource type which should support loginTimeout on all database drivers.
replies.author: KyleAure

timeline.bodyText: What was behind the decision to the switch from runInServlet to runTestWithResponse?  Were you just wanting to eliminate redundant testing methods?
timeline.author: gjwatts

replies.bodyText: Yes!  runTestWithResponse was available through the componenttest.topology.utils package.  I hadn't realized that before.
